subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which of the following forts is located in Jodhpur?
question_hi: जोधपुर में क्या इन संस्करणों में है।
explanation_en: Umaid Bhawan Palace is located in Jodhpur.
explanation_hi: उमाई बहान पाल जोधपुर में है।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which temple is dedicated to Meera Bharat Sanskriti Mandir?
question_hi: मीरा के पूर्वक मेरा भारत संस्करणी मन्दर
explanation_en: The Krishna Temple is dedicated to Lord Krishna and is popularly known as Meera Bharat Mandir.
explanation_hi: कृष्णा मंदर के मेरा भारत मंदर
explanation: Krishna Temple is popularly known as Meera Bharat Mandir and is dedicated to Lord Krishna.
